product_name: Royal Robbins Promenade Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Enjoy the best of both worlds on your travels in the women's Promenade Jacket from Royal Robbins. It's made mostly of cotton for soft breathability, with nylon to knock back wrinkles. Jacket offers lightweight warmth and UPF 30 sun protection; dries quickly if you get caught in a sudden shower. Full front zipper is covered by a snap placket for a clean look and wind protection. Snaps also close the cuffs and chest pockets. Adjustable tabs in back let you customize the fit at the waist. Royal Robbins Promenade Jacket has logo-rivet-reinforced hand pockets. Closeout.
short_description: Enjoy the best of both worlds on your travels in the women's Promenade Jacket from Royal Robbins. It's made mostly of cotton for soft breathability, with nylon to knock back wrinkles.
